Summary: Bright white egg shaped object traveling northwest at a high rate of speed.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was relaxing in my friends pool and noticed this light flying towards my direction. As it got closer, I just saw that it was very bright and it was egg shaped. It was definitely a solid object and pretty high up in the sky. The object was gone in less than a minute. I was calm throughout the event. However, when the event was over, I felt like I saw something amazing. I live near an airport and I see conventional craft everyday. This was different and I have never seen anything like this. My friends and wife were inside during this event. There were no other witnesses that I am aware of.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Essex
There was one other sighting in Essex on or around June 19th 2010
